about.title: About Me
about.paragraph_one_about: I worked as a Buyer from 2011 to 2021, dealing with <1>{{span_one_about}}</1>. However, I chose a career transition and saw a great opportunity in the technology field to try something new.
about.span_one_about: negotiation for service contracts, purchasing supplies and consumables, and contract management
about.paragraph_two_about: Today, I am a Full Stack Developer graduated from @Trybe, with experience in web development, database management, and API creation. Additionally, I have acquired skills in <1>{{span_two_about}}</1> through collaborative projects and hackathons.
about.span_two_about: teamwork, communication, critical thinking, programming logic, and problem-solving
about.paragraph_three_about: I am always looking to improve myself and find new learning opportunities. I am open to new opportunities to apply my technical skills and contribute to challenging projects.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: +3 years as a developer working with various web applications focused on backend.

project_one.title: I Love Pastel
project_one.description: Web application for order management and inventory management.

project_two.title: KJR Development
project_two.description: Landing page of a software house.

project_three.title: Upload AI
project_three.description: Project for video-to-audio conversion and text transcription with OpenAI API for title and description suggestions.

project_four.title: Gym API
project_four.description: API for gym management in the Gympass style. Applying S.O.L.I.D. principles.

project_five.title: Pizza Shop API
project_five.description: API for pizzeria management in the IFood style. Allows tracking orders, changing status, canceling, and generating a dashboard.

project_six.title: Real-Time Voting System
project_six.description: API for real-time voting application. Creating polls, voting, and tracking votes.
